problem_text: Lines l, m, and n are perpendicular bisectors of \triangle P Q R and meet at T. If T Q = 2 x, P T = 3 y - 1, and T R = 8, find z.
compact_text: Lines l, m, and n are perpendicular bisectors of \triangle PQR and meet at T. If TQ = 2x, PT = 3y-1, and TR = 8, find z.
annotat_text: Lines $l$, $m$, and $n$ are perpendicular bisectors of $\triangle PQR$ and meet at $T$. If $TQ = 2x$, $PT = 3y - 1$, and $TR = 8$, find $z$.
